mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, r.REST_PHONE, r.REST_ADR, r.REST_BH, r.REST_LOC, r.REST_CATE, i.REST_IMG_NAME, i.REST_IMG_NO, DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE AS rand_val FROM RESTAURANT r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REST_NO, REST_IMG_NAME, REST_IMG_NO FROM ( SELECT REST_NO, REST_IMG_NAME, REST_IMG_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY REST_NO ORDER BY REST_IMG_NO) AS rn FROM REST_IMG ) i WHERE i.rn = 1 ) i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 300

SELECT e.RES_NO, e.MEM_NO, e.RES_DATE, e.RES_TIME, e.RES_MEMO, r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, r.REST_ADR, r.REST_BH, r.REST_CATE, i.REST_IMG_NAME, b.IS_PUBLIC FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN RESERVE e ON r.REST_NO = e.REST_NO LEFT JOIN REST_IMG i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO AND i.REST_IMG_NO=1 LEFT JOIN BOOKMARK b ON e.MEM_NO = b.MEM_NO AND r.REST_NO = b.REST_NO WHERE e.MEM_NO = #{mem_no} ORDER BY e.RES_TIME ASC, CASE WHEN b.IS_PUBLIC = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN b.IS_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END
